name: ShieldHero
description:
This game is made for Jammin 2021 gamejam. The theme is reflection so this is the best I can think and do .

You are a soldier who has a shield that deflects the canon balls of the enemy castle you have to defeat it in 10 hits of  cannon balls and how you do that , the rule is simple reflect until it hit it 10 times and you win.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move .

Space to jump.

Art and gameplay completely made by me (ZEESHAN)

Sounds. - Sharp-Jeremy Korpas.(background music)

and Casual game sounds (free asset pack) Respectfully.

Thanks if you enjoy it . Have a nice day.
